RelatedSentence: PATNA : Refusing to go back on his decision to quit , Nitish Kumar on Monday anointed 68 - year - old Jitan Ram Manjhi , a Musahar Dalit from the most backward sections of the Scheduled Castes , as the new chief minister of Bihar .
Manjhi will be sworn in with his cabinet on Tuesday after governor DY Patil invited him to form the government .
